alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:32PM CDT until September 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rockwall County in north central Texas... South central Collin County in north central Texas... Northeastern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 632 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near University Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, Richardson, Rowlett, Wylie, Rockwall, Farmers Branch, University Park, Sachse, Addison, Highland Park, Murphy, Lucas, Parker, Mobile City, Dallas Love Field, St. Paul, Lake Ray Hubbard, and White Rock Lake. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 63 and 71. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
